meanings.sent1: The undecayed fruit looked fresh and ripe.
meanings.sent2: The undecayed wood had a strong, natural scent.
meanings.sent3: The undecayed vegetables in the fridge were a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her undecayed enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The undecayed flowers in the garden bloomed beautifully.

meanings.definition: Remaining in a state of preservation.
meanings.sent1: The undecayed ruins of the ancient city were awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent2: The undecayed documents provided valuable historical insights.
meanings.sent3: The undecayed cake from last week was a sweet treat.
meanings.sent4: His undecayed memories of childhood brought a smile to his face.
meanings.sent5: The undecayed painting retained its vibrant colors over time.
